title: E15 A Sample of Our Outhouse and Catfished by Lucifer
description:
It’s episode 15, and Em and Christine TOTALLY know that, despite what they may or may not have said in the intro… 
Listen, this episode is full of bad juju.We chat about the ghosts of St. Alban’s Sanatorium and the disturbing tale of DeeDee & Gypsy Rose Blancharde. There’s a goat-headed man who shoves people down stairs, a haunted bowling alley with a suicide bathroom, and a doctor named BERNARDO FLASTERSTEIN.
Honestly, what more do we need to say?
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
